Hosea or Osee__06.1: In their affliction they will rise early to me: Come, and let us return to the Lord:
Hosea or Osee__06.2: For he hath taken us, and he will heal us: he will strike, and he will cure us.
Hosea or Osee__06.3: He will revive us after two days: on the third day he will raise us up, and we shall live in his sight. We shall know, and we shall follow on, that we may know the Lord. His going forth is prepared as the morning light, and he will come to us as the early and the latter rain to the earth.
Hosea or Osee__06.4: What shall I do to thee, O Ephraim? what shall I do to thee, O Juda? your mercy is as a morning cloud, and as the dew that goeth away in the morning.
Hosea or Osee__06.5: For this reason have I hewed them by the prophets, I have slain them by the words of my mouth: and thy judgments shall go forth as the light.
Hosea or Osee__06.6: For I desired mercy, and not sacrifice: and the knowledge of God more than holocausts.
Hosea or Osee__06.7: But they, like Adam, have transgressed the covenant, there have they dealt treacherously against me.
Hosea or Osee__06.8: Galaad is a city of workers of idols, <u>supplanted with blood</u>.
Hosea or Osee__06.9: And like the jaws of highway robbers, they conspire with the priests who murder in the way those that pass out of Sichem: for they have wrought wickedness.
Hosea or Osee__06.10: I have seen a horrible thing in the house of Israel: the fornications of Ephraim there: Israel is defiled.
Hosea or Osee__06.11: And thou also, O Juda, set thee a harvest, when I shall bring back the captivity of my people.
